title: Tech News: Latest Gadgets Launch Updates, Smartphone Reviews, Technology Articles

items.title: Apple Replay is here. What's the No. 1 song on Apple Music’s 2025 songs chart?
items.summary:
- Apple Music's 2025 year-end chart names Rosé and Bruno Mars' 'APT.' as the global song of the year (No. 1).
- The track also led Apple Music’s Shazam Global Radio Spins, the Top 100 Global Radio chart, and the most-read lyrics charts.
- Other highlights include year-end trends like 36 women on the 100 songs, seven of the Top 10 by/featuring a woman, and Tyler, the Creator as Apple Music's artist of the year.

iQOO 15 5G mobile launched in India: Check out specifications, features and price
items.summary:
- Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 with up to 16GB RAM and 512GB storage; Legend (white) or Alpha Black.
- 6.85-inch 144Hz LTPO AMOLED; 8000 sq mm VC cooling; 50MP triple rear (main, ultra-wide, periscope 3x) and 32MP front.
- 7000mAh, 100W wired and 40W wireless charging; IP68/IP69 resistance; Rs 72,999 (12GB+256GB) and Rs 79,999 (16GB+512GB); sales from Dec 1, 2025 on Amazon and iQOO site.

items.title: Thomson introduces QLED MEMC TVs in India with Dolby Vision: Check specs, features, and more
items.summary:
- Thomson launches 55-inch, 65-inch and 75-inch QLED MEMC 4K TVs in India with 1.1B colors, Dolby Vision and HDR10+.
- 120 Hz MEMC with VRR and ALLM for smooth gaming and sports; 70 W Dolby Audio stereo with four speakers plus Dolby Atmos and Dolby Digital Plus.
- Google TV 5.0 with 10,000+ apps and 500,000+ titles; voice remote with hotkeys for Netflix, Prime Video and YouTube; prices from Rs 31,999 to Rs 64,999; Flipkart exclusive.
